name: Animated crocodile
description: Animated crocodile game asset include two animated entities in two colors. Crocodile in the water, crocodile out of the water As usual the download includeds a fully rigged Spriter file with premade animations. You can use this file to export higher resolution spritesheets than the ones provided and or keyframes. If you just want quick inclusion into your game you can use the HD spritesheets also pincluded in the download
